Text: This is the seeder let me know how the program worked
It works for me.Although it doesn't support MP3 files.You have to covert them first...
Yeah i failed to mention that wav studio can only work with wav files
Any clue for MP3 support? thanx

There is a program that's called Wavpad & it works with all sorts of files & it can batch convert aswell it lasts only 2 weeks on trial but when it expires you only have to uninstall it & reinstall it for another 2 weeks & so on
the site is: dubau dubau dubau dot nch dot com dot au slash wavpad slash masters dot html
Unfortunately, this version of Wave Studio does not have MP3 support, and I've been Googling for literally ages for a working download link to an older version.
